data.title: Hello world! This title is STUBBED!
data.body:
Welcome to the all new EBANQ!

We are proud to announce the completely new EBANQ online banking system based on AWS microservices!

Our microservices specialists rebuilt the entire system to make the great even greater. A total revamp in order to stay ahead of the game, a transition to modular architecture based on AWS microservices and the ultimate in future proofing. The new system is API based giving developers unprecedented flexibility when building custom features and third party integrations around EBANQ. Please find API documentation here:

EBANQ 4 DEVELOPERS

The new system is a complete rebuild. No use of any legacy tech, no compromises, yet fully compatible with the "old" EBANQ system ensuring friction free migration of data and individual configurations for institutional EBANQ clients on five continents. Quite a challenge. The result is a new kind of awesome!
